sources.title: Hotsy Footsy (1952)
sources.description: Magoo's at a Rutgers alumni dance and winds up squaring off with a pro wrestler at the arena across the alley, thinking he's dancing with the wife of an old friend. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/hotsy-footsy-1952/

metadata.Plot: Magoo's at a Rutgers alumni dance and winds up squaring off with a pro wrestler at the arena across the alley, thinking he's dancing with the wife of an old friend.
metadata.Actors: Jim Backus, Jerry Hausner, Isabel Randolph
